snippet: The decision to drop the charges came as the Pentagon released its annual report on sexual assault and sexual harassment at the three service academies.
abstract: Charges in sexual assault case are dropped against Naval Academy midshipman Eric Graham after his statements about encounter were determined to be inadmissible as he had not been read his rights before questioning; decision means only Joshua Tate, one of three former football players accused of sexually assaulting a female midshipman in 2012, will face court-martial; charges were never brought against the third.
lead_paragraph: The decision to drop the charges came as the Pentagon released its annual report on sexual assault and sexual harassment at the three service academies.

headline.main: Sexual Assault Charges Dropped at Annapolis
headline.print_headline: Sex Assault Charges Dropped at Annapolis

keywords.value: United States Defense and Military Forces
